title: Can't repair my client
body:
This afternoon, I had a League update when I opened the launcher but it said I had corrupted files so I clicked on "repair" but it failed.
I tried everything asked in the support article about it but it still does not work.

Any idea?

replies.body: Let's try running a full reinstall with a clean uninstall first to make sure that all the corrupted files were removed first. Grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it as admin. Make sure you check the **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall** options and disable any firewalls temporarily while it runs.
Alright, I'll try this and let you know when the download is over if it works! :)

It worked for yesterday but now I tried to open the game now but it says again that the files are corrupted and the repair as failed


-Edit- All my files on my hardrive have been deleted but League. what is this??
